eng: separator: A colon is between an hint sentences and a sentences. Before and after the colon has to be complete sentences. Don't use a colon before or after
separator: A comma is used after an "o" to addressing people. Optional you can putdone, finished, completed, ended, close a comma before a preposition. Don't use a comma before or after
separator: A declarative sentence ends with a full stop. Don't use a full stop before or after the other separators "e", "la", "li", "pi", ".", "!", "?", ":".
separator: An imperative or an interjection sentence ends with an exclamation mark. Don't use an exclamation mark before or after the other separators "e", "la", "li", "pi", ".", "!", "?", ":".
separator: An questions always ends in a question mark. Don't use a question mark before or after the other separators "e", "la", "li", "o", "pi", ".", "!", "?", ":".
separator: Quotation marks are used for words with original spelling or for quotes.

eng: The most merciful thing in the world, I think, is the inability of the human mind to correlate all its contents. mi kute e kalama sina, la mi pilin e ni: sina lili kin.
sina o toki!
sina pakala e ali.
kon sina li jaki.
sina kama sona e toki Inli.
sina toki kepeken tenpo lili.
sina pana e sona mute tawa mi.
sina jo e ale lon lawa.
jan Ton o, sina pilin ala pilin e ni: mi meli pi unpa mute?
eng: You think that I am a loose woman, don't you Tom?

tok: sina pilin e ni: jan li pona unpa. taso tenpo pini la mi kama sona e jan li pilin e ni: jan en kulupu jan ali li ike li wile ala e ni: jan ante li ken e ike ona; jan li pana e ike tawa jan kepeken nasin mute tan ni.
eng: You think that people are okay, but I allow one to think that people and all societies are bad. No one wants other people to tolerate their mischief. People give grief to people because their viewpoints vary.

tok: sina tawa kepeken linja tomo tawa.
sina tawa kepeken noka lon sewi pi telo kiwen.
sina wile utala anu seme? o kama tawa mi!
eng: You want a piece of me? Come on!

tok: sina wile tawa telo suli.
eng: You want to go to the ocean.

tok: tenpo pini la sina mute li pilin pona.
tenpo pini la sina li jan pona mi.
sina toki e lon la jan ali li toki e ni: sina pona.
eng: You will be praised for speaking the truth.

tok: pona sina o open e lupa lukin.
eng: You will please open the window.

tok: sina kama jo e ijo ala kepeken toki wawa.
eng: You won't get anything by shouting.

tok: ijo Sakepo li ma tomo lawa pi ma Lowasi.
eng: Zagreb is the capital of Croatia.

tok: tenpo mute la jan Muwije li sike e suno.
mi mute o kama pali e ijo.
mi wile tawa lape.
eng: I need to get to bed.

tok: ni li seme?
tenpo ni la jan Muka li jo e sike suno mute.
nimi len li "Muwikija".
tenpo kama lili la mi kama sin.
a! mi ken ala toki.
cmn: 我不知道應該說什麼才好。

tok: mi sona ala kin e ni: mi wile toki e seme.
eng: I simply don't know what to tell...
cmn: 我只是不知道應該說什麼而已……

tok: tenpo kama la ni li kama ala.
weka sina li ike tawa mi.
mi kama sin, la mi toki tawa ona kepeken ilo toki lon tenpo suno kama.
eng: I'll call them tomorrow when I come back.
cmn: 我明天回来后会打电话给他们。

tok: jan mute li pilin e ni: mi nasa.
cmn: 大部份的人覺得我瘋了。

tok: ona li utala noka e mi!!
a! o lukin e pipi kule!
mi jan suli, la mi wile jan lawa.
eng: When I grow up, I want to be a king.

tok: tan seme la sina wile sona e ni?
sina lukin e sitelen nimi pi kalama musi ni, la ona li jo e kon pi mute ala a.
eng: If you look at the song's lyrics, they really don't mean much.

tok: jan mute li lon ni la ni li ike mute tawa mi.
eng: I hate it when there are a lot of people.

tok: mi wile tawa lape.
eng: I have to go to bed.

tok: ken la sike esun kama la lete li kama.
eng: We might have frost next week.

tok: seme li kama lon tenpo pini?
ken la sina sona e ni: seme li kama.
eng: You can probably guess what happens though.

tok: o pini e ni. ona li pilin ike tan ni!
eng: Stop it! You're making her feel uncomfortable!
cmn: 得了！你弄得她不自在了！

tok: mi toki ala lon toki Nijon.
ni li musi nimi.
sina wile ala wile e moku telo?
eng: Would you like to drink anything?

tok: soweli walo pi noka wawa li toki e ni: "seme li lon?"
eng: "What's the matter?" asked the little white rabbit.

tok: "kalama musi li pona tawa ona." "mi sama."
"sina tawa ala. tan seme?" "mi wile ala."
eng: "Why aren't you going?" "Because I don't want to."
cmn: "你为什么不去？""因为我不想去。"

tok: tenpo pini la mi weka la sina pilin ike anu seme?
tenpo sinpin la tomo tawa linja li pini la o open ala.
eng: Do not open before the train stops.
cmn: 在火车停下来之前不要打开。

tok: sina toki ala toki kepeken toki Italija?
tenpo kama la sina awen ala sona e mi.
mi mute li lape ala tan kalama.
eng: We can't sleep because of the noise.
cmn: 由于噪音，我们无法入睡。

tok: mi ken ala ken toki tawa meli Pon?
eng: May I talk to Ms. Brown?

tok: mi tu li lon utala. mi wile toki tawa sina.
eng: I have a bone to pick with you.

tok: ma tomo Paki li ma tomo pi pona lukin nanpa wan.
eng: Paris is the most beautiful city in the world.

tok: ali kin li ali.
eng: There's no doubt that the universe is infinite.
cmn: 宇宙毫无疑问是无限的。

tok: sina nasa lukin.
ni li pona mute tawa mi.
o open e uta sina.
ona li ike ala ike?
sina wile ala e ijo la sina jo kin e ijo.
eng: Not wanting is the same as having.

tok: o weka tan mi.
tenpo pi mute seme la sina sike e suno?
jan ala li kama.
mi toki tawa sina la o lukin tawa mi.
eng: Look at me when I'm talking to you.

tok: sina pilin seme? tawa sina pi tenpo pini li pona ala pona?
eng: How are you? Did you have a good trip?

tok: sina pilin e lon pi ijo seme, taso sina ken ala pana e ona tawa lukin?
eng: What do you believe is true even though you cannot prove it?

tok: tan seme la pilin ike li lon ale?
eng: Why is life so full of suffering?

tok: mi jo e jan olin e jan lili tu.
eng: I am married and have two children.
cmn: 我结婚了，而且有两个孩子。

tok: ni li toki pi lon ale.
jan li ken ala pali e ni: ona li wile la jan li pali e ni: ona li ken.
eng: When you can't do what you want, you do what you can.

tok: jan li pana e lili tawa ona la ona li wile jo e ale.
eng: Give him an inch and he'll take a mile.

tok: mi toki tawa jan seme?
ona mute li kama jo ala e mani tawa ona li lon supa lape la o awen ala lon supa lape.
eng: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
cmn: 别老躺着啊，要是躺着能挣钱也行。

tok: telo sewi li kama anpa.
mi mute li jan sewi lon utala.
jan pi mute nanpa wan li wile kute e toki ona taso.
eng: Most people only want to hear their own truth.
cmn: 大部分人只想听到他们自己的真理。

tok: sina tan ma seme?
ona li lape sama ni: jan lili pi lili mute li lape.
cmn: 他正睡着，像个婴儿一样。

tok: toki li ala la kama li ala.
eng: There cannot be progress without communication.

tok: sike ma li tawa ala lon nasin sike lon poka sina.
eng: The world doesn't revolve around you.

tok: wan, tu, tu wan, tu tu, luka, luka wan, luka tu, luka tu wan, luka tu tu, luka luka.
eng: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten.
cmn: 一、二、三、四、五、六、七、八、九、十。

tok: pona lukin li insa lon lukin pi jan lukin taso.
eng: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.

tok: mi pilin la mi ken tawa ali.
eng: I feel that I am free.

tok: mi wile e ilo pi kalama musi. a!
seme la sina lon?
ken ala!
ko pi telo mama li moku pi telo ala tan telo mama pi soweli ante mute.
eng: Cheese is a solid food made from the milk of cows, goats, sheep, and other mammals.
cmn: 奶酪是由母牛、山羊、绵羊或其它哺乳动物的奶被加工制造的坚硬的食物。

tok: tan kepeken lawa la mi kepeken ilo telo sewi lon tenpo pimeja.
tenpo ni la mi pali ala e ni la tenpo ala la mi kama pali e ni.
eng: If I don't do it now, I never will.

tok: lape pona. sitelen lape pona tawa sina.
ken la sina sona e pona la mi ike tan ni: mi lukin e mi taso.
eng: Perhaps you are right, I have been selfish.

tok: poki len seme li ijo sina?
mi pali e ijo wan ni la mi lawa e ijo tu ni tawa pona.
eng: That way I kill two birds with one stone.

tok: o toki e ni tawa jan sama pi pali mi.
eng: Go and speak to my colleague.

tok: o kama jo e ijo sina o tawa weka.
eng: Pick up your things and go away.

tok: ona li jan pi mani mute.
o lukin wawa. nasin seme la jan li pali e ni? mi pana e ni tawa lukin sina.
eng: Look carefully. I'm going to show you how it's done.

tok: tenpo pi mute seme la sina sike e suno?
mama mije li lon la mije lili ona li lon kin.
lon li lon la pilin kama pona li lon.
eng: As long as there's life, there's hope.

tok: nasin ali li lawa lon ma tomo Lone.
tenpo pimeja la soweli tomo ale li pimeja walo.
eng: At night all cats are grey.
cmn: 猫在黑暗中都是灰色的。

tok: o pana e sona pi nasin pali tawa mi.
eng: Teach me how to do it.

tok: o awen lon tomo pi jan awen.
kama ni li pona tawa sina.
sina wile ala wile e moku kili telo?
ni li pona tawa sina la o pali.
mi mute li sama.
eng: We are two of a kind.

tok: sinpin li jo e kute.
tan kalama uta mi li ike sijelo la mi ken toki ala.
eng: I have a frog in my throat.
cmn: 我緊張得說不出話來了。

tok: jan li moku pi mute ike la ona li kama suli.
eng: You will get fat if you eat too much.

tok: ona li mani seme?
o weka e ike mi. mi luka e nena nanpa pakala.
eng: Sorry, I've dialled the wrong number.

tok: mi wile e ni: sina toki lon tawa mi.
eng: I want you to tell me the truth.
cmn: 我想要你把真相告诉我。

tok: sona mi li wile. sijelo mi taso li wawa ala.
eng: The spirit is willing, but the flesh is weak.

tok: mi wile tawa supa lape.
jan ni li ike mute tawa mi.
tenpo ni la jan Muka li jo e sike suno mute.
nimi len li "Muwikija".
tenpo kama lili la mi kama sin.
mi wile toki. taso mi lukin ala e nimi.
cmn: 我不知道應該說什麼才好。

tok: tenpo kama li pini, la ni li pini ala.
mi lon nena.
mi ken ala tawa tan ni: sina lon nasin mi.
sina wile kama jo e ni lon esun, la sina pana e mani Welo mute luka luka.
tenpo suno la mi kama jo e mani Welo ale.
ni li kama ala.
weka sina li ike tawa mi.
sina o lape.
toki pi jan mute la mi nasa.
eng: Most people think that I'm crazy.
cmn: 大部份的人覺得我瘋了。

tok: ni li toki mi a!
a! pipi li lon!
o wawa!
ona li sin ala tawa mi.
mi suli mute a.
mi toki taso!
ni li tan ni: sina jan lili meli.
ken ni la mi pilin ike. taso mi moli ala e mi.
cmn: 我会不高兴，但我不会自杀。

tok: ni li suli ala.
mi wile tawa lape.
ken la lete li kama lon sike esun kama.
mi olin e sina.
pona a!
sina wile ala wile e moku telo?
o pana ala e telo lukin.
jan Tosi li sona mute.
tan seme la mi mute li tawa ala lon tomo mi?
kulupu lawa pi jan ale li nasin lawa pi ike nanpa wan. mi lukin pali lon nasin lawa ante mute. ona taso li ike mute.
cmn: 除了那些我们尝试过的政府形态，民主是最差的那种了。

tok: jan mute li lon poka ona la ona li kama pilin ike.
cmn: 他被很多人围着，自然变得有点紧张。

tok: sina jan pi pona mute a!
jan li lon tomo pi kasi kama la jan o tawa ala e kiwen lon sewi.
eng: Those who live in glass houses shouldn't throw stones.

tok: sina toki ala toki kepeken toki Italija?
o kute ala e toki ona.
eng: Don't take any notice of what he says.

tok: jan mute li jo ala e nasin lon ale.
cmn: 许多人毫无目的地随波逐流。

tok: mi ken ala ken toki tawa jan Pow?
cmn: 我能和布朗小姐说话吗？

tok: sina wile e seme?
sina nasa lukin.
ni li ijo pi mi ala!
sina wile ala wile tawa musi poka mi?
mi weka e poki mani mi.
ona li unpa lukin kin.
jan ala li kama.
oko mi li telo suli. sina ken lukin e kon mi kepeken telo ni.
cmn: 我的眼睛是一片反映我梦想的海洋。

tok: tenpo Santa pona!
ilo sona li nasa e jan.
sina moku ala e kili tan seme?
wile li lon la nasin kin li lon.
eng: Where there is a will, there is a way.

tok: tenpo suno wan la jan li pini ala e pali pi ma tomo Loma.
eng: Rome was not built in a day.

tok: toki ala li toki e ni: wile!
o kama jo e lipu, o lukin e ona.
pona sina la sina ken ala ken kepeken sin e ilo toki lon tenpo kama?
cmn: 你可以晚點再打電話來嗎？

tok: ali li pona.
mi wile ala tawa tomo sona.
eng: I don't want to go to school!

tok: olin pi mi mute li pini. o pana e sike mi tawa mi a!
cmn: 我们之间完了，把戒指还给我！

tok: telo li kama tan sewi.
ona li sona a anu seme?
mi tawa ma soweli lon tenpo suno pini.
ona meli li wile ala toki tan ni.
sina tawa ma, la o pini e lupa.
mije sama lili mi li lukin e ilo pi sitelen tawa.
pali mi li pona mute tawa mi.
o pini e toki pi ijo ike mi!
pan pi mute seme li awen?
tenpo ale la tenpo pi kama sona li pona.
eng: It's never too late to learn.

tok: toki sina li seme?
mi wile e suwi.
mi mute li moku lon tenpo seme? mi wile moku!
cmn: 甚麼時候吃飯啊？我快餓死了啦！

tok: sike ma li jo e jan nasa mute.
tomo telo li lon seme?
mi wile e ilo pi kalama musi. a!
ni li kama tawa seme?
nasa a!
tenpo suno sin ali en tenpo pimeja sin ali la, mi pana e moku tawa soweli tomo mi.
cmn: 每天早晚，我给我的猫喂食。

tok: o lukin tawa sina.
ni li suli ala.
toki li pona. taso toki ala li pona mute.
eng: Speech is silver, silence is golden.

tok: waso pi tenpo lili li kama jo e pipi.
sona sin ala li sona sin pona.
olin jaki li lon ala. poki jan pona li lon ala.
cmn: 沒有骯髒的愛情, 也沒有美麗的監獄。

tok: o pilin sama ni: sina lon tomo sina.
mi wile ala sin e ni.
mi kama moku e telo nasa poka jan pona mi.
cmn: 我去和朋友喝了杯啤酒。

tok: ona li utala.
mi moku e sike mama kala.
ona li mani seme?
o pilin e lipu.
mi pilin pona tan ni: mi lukin e sina lon tenpo sin.
mije mute ni li jan seme?
a! mi ken ala toki.
cmn: 我不知道應該說什麼才好。

tok: ike la mi tawa weka tan lipu sona.
lon taso li pona.
eng: Nothing is beautiful but the truth.

tok: sina toki ala toki kepeken toki Italija?
nimi mi li Se.
mi wile kama sona lon ma tomo Paki.
eng: I'd like to study in Paris.

tok: mi wile e ilo pi kalama musi. a!
toki li kiwen walo. toki ala li kiwen jelo.
eng: Speech is silver, silence is golden.

tok: tenpo suno ni li tenpo suno nanpa luka luka luka tu wan pi sike mun nanpa luka wan. sike suno sin pi jan Muka li open.
eng: Today is June 18th and it is Muiriel's birthday!
cmn: 今天是６月１８号，也是Muiriel的生日！

tok: mi sona ala e ni: mi toki e seme tawa sina?
eng: I simply don't know what to say...
cmn: 我只是不知道應該說什麼而已……

tok: sitelen ni li sin anu seme?
mi sona ala e ni: mi jo e tenpo.
eng: I don't know if I have the time.
cmn: 我不知道我有沒有時間。

tok: nasin pi pana e sona lon ma ali ni li ike tawa mi.
eng: Education in this world disappoints me.
cmn: 世界上的教育都讓我失望。

tok: ni li tan sina wile ala wan.
eng: It's because you don't want to be alone.

tok: tenpo mute lili la ona li nasa.
eng: Sometimes he can be a strange guy.
cmn: 有时候他会是一个奇怪的男生。

tok: tenpo kama la sina kama sona la mi wile ala sina pali e ijo ante.
eng: I'll do my best not to disturb your studying.
cmn: 我会尽量不打扰你复习。

tok: mi wile sona e ni: ni li sama tawa jan ante?
eng: I can only wonder if this is the same for everyone else.
cmn: 我只能问自己这对其他所有人是不是一回事呢。

tok: mi toki e ni tawa ona mute: o pana e lipu ante tawa mi.
eng: I told them to send me another ticket.
cmn: 我請他們再寄給我一張票。

tok: sina ken ala awen tawa mi.
tenpo pini la mi wile kama jan pi sona mun.
eng: I once wanted to be an astrophysicist.
cmn: 我曾經想過當個太空物理學家。

tok: tenpo ali la sona soweli li ike tawa mi.
cmn: 我從來沒喜歡過生物學。

tok: pona.
sina wile ala wile e moku telo?
eng: Do you want to drink something?

tok: jan pi mani lili li jan ni: ona li jo ala e mani pi lili ike, taso ona li wile jo e ijo pi mute ike.
eng: Poor is not the one who has too little, but the one who wants too much.
cmn: 贫穷的不是拥有太少的人，而是想要太多的人。

tok: sina toki ala toki kepeken toki Italija?
nimi sina li seme?
tenpo pi mute seme la sina sike e suno?
jan tu li pilin sama la jan wan li namako.
eng: If two men always have the same opinion, one of them is unnecessary.
cmn: 如果两个人总是意见相同，那么他们其中一个就没必要了。

tok: sina tan ma seme?
wan, tu, tu wan, tu tu, luka, luka wan, luka tu, luka tu wan, luka tu tu, luka luka.
eng: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten.
cmn: 一、二、三、四、五、六、七、八、九、十。

tok: mi jo ala e tenpo pi suli pona ni: mi tawa esun, mi toki "tawa pona" tawa mama mi.
eng: I had neither the time to go shopping, nor to say goodbye to my mother.
cmn: 我既没时间购物，又没时间跟我妈妈说再见。

tok: tenpo pi mute seme la sina sike e suno?
moku pona!
ko lete pi kon sewi li kama lon tenpo pimeja ale.
sina toki ala toki kepeken toki Italija?
tenpo pi mute seme la sina sike e suno?
mi olin e sina.
lon taso li pona.
eng: Nothing is beautiful but the truth.

tok: sina wile ala wile e moku telo?
eng: Would you like to drink anything?

tok: sina toki ala toki kepeken toki Italija?
sina lon poka mi. ale li pona lon tenpo ni.
eng: If you are by my side, I don't need anything else.

tok: mi wile ala moku tan sina.
eng: Thanks to you I've lost my appetite.

tok: mi wile ala tawa tomo sona.
eng: I don't want to go to school!

tok: telo li kama tan sewi.
ona li mani seme?
a! mi ken ala toki.
cmn: 我不知道應該說什麼才好。

tok: mi olin e sina!
tan seme la sina kama ala lon tomo mi?
eng: Why don't you come visit us?

tok: ni li pona tawa mi.
tenpo ni: tomo tawa kon li tawa poka pi kon tawa nasa, la jan lawa pi tomo tawa kon li toki wawa e ni tawa jan tawa ale: ona o kepeken len linja wawa.
eng: As the plane was approaching turbulence, the pilot asked the passengers aboard the plane to fasten their seat belts.

tok: tenpo pi mute seme la sina sike e suno?
tenpo ni la jan Muka li jo e sike suno mute.
ni li seme?
ni li kama lon tenpo pini weka.
cmn: 这事发生在很多年以前。

tok: ona li esun e ilo nasa lon kulupu pi kalama musi.
cmn: 她在演唱会的场地贩卖毒品。

tok: meli li kama, a!
kon sewi li seme?
sina ken ala ken open e suno?
eng: Can you turn on the light, please?

tok: ni li mani lili sina.
mi mije lili.
mi wile lukin e sina.
mi jan Asimoto.
mi sona e ni: seme li lon insa pi poki ni.
eng: I know what's in the box.

tok: mi kama sona e toki Inli. mi kama sona e toki Kanse kin.
eng: I study French in addition to English.

tok: toki Inli li pona tawa mi. taso mi toki ike kepeken ona.
eng: I like English, but I cannot speak well.
cmn: 我喜欢英语，但是我说不好。

tok: mi wile tawa ma tomo Lanten.
mi wile pali e ijo pi mute ni: mi weka e ni: mi wile pini e lupa tomo kepeken ilo open.
eng: I was in such a hurry that I forgot to lock the door.

tok: mi wile mute moku.
mi lukin e ilo pi sitelen tawa. pini ni la mi tawa supa lape.
eng: After I watched TV, I went to bed.

tok: mi pilin wawa e ni: toki ni li lon.
mi wile e ni.
mi kama jo e poki tu pi telo wawa.
eng: I had two cups of coffee.

tok: mi jan Mewika.
pona.
jan sama mi li lukin e jan lili lon tenpo mute.
eng: My sister often looks after the baby.

tok: mi kute e ala.
tenpo pini poka la ona li sitelen e lipu tawa mi lon tenpo pi mute lili.
eng: He writes to me less and less often these days.

tok: tenpo suno ni la mi wile lape mute.
ken la telo li kama lon tenpo ni pi suno anpa.
moku ni pi kili ante mute li jo e pilin uta pi kili Siton.
cmn: 這道沙拉有檸檬的味道。

tok: soweli tomo li soweli sona.
eng: A dog is a clever animal.

tok: ala!
jan akesi li kama lon insa tomo tawa ni: ona li wile kama jo e mani.
eng: A thief broke into the house to steal the money.

tok: ken ni li pona tawa mi: ona li pona tawa sina.
eng: I hope that you will like it.

tok: ale li pona.
tenpo ni: mi tawa tomo sona, la mi kama lon poka pi jan Ton.
eng: I met Tom on my way to school.

tok: o weka.
mi pilin pona tan ni: mi lukin e sina.
mi pana e ko jaki telo.
tenpo kama ale la mi olin e sina.
"sina pilin seme?" "mi pilin pona."
mi lon poka sina.
mi wile e poki ni.
sina tawa jan pi pona sijelo anu seme?
eng: Did you go to see a doctor?

tok: mi ken pilin e pilin sina.
mi pana e ike tawa sina, la ni li ike tawa mi.
eng: I'm sorry if I disturbed you.

len noka pi jan Mewi li pakala lon sijelo pi sike noka sewi.
eng: Mary's jeans are ripped at the knees.

tok: sina mute li toki ala toki e toki Ukawina?
sina toki ala toki lon toki Ukawina?
jan ali li pini pali.
o toki ala e ike sina lon tenpo ale.
jan Ton en jan Mewi li wile moku e telo.
eng: Tom and Mary are both thirsty.

tok: sitelen insa sina li nasa.
open pi tenpo suno ale la mi moku e telo pimeja seli.
jan Ton en mi li pali.
jan ale li mu pi pilin musi ike tan mi.
eng: They all made fun of me.

tok: o pana e telo pimeja sin tawa mi.
eng: Please give me another cup of coffee.

tok: o pana e ilo open tawa jan Ton.
jan Ton li pana e moku tawa jan pi tomo ala.
eng: Tom gave the homeless man some food.

tok: sina wile tawa, la o tawa a!
eng: Go if you want to go.

tok: pan mun ni li pona kin tawa mi.
seme la esun pi ilo nasa li lon?
mi wile e ni: jan lili mi li pilin pona.
eng: I want my children to be happy.

tok: Mi jan Likato.
sina wile pana e ijo tawa mi. ni li pona mute tawa kute mi.
jan Ton li toki e ni: ona li wile ala tawa ma tomo Pasen.
eng: Tom said that he didn't intend to go to Boston.

tok: sike suno ale la jan pi mute mute li kama moli tan weka moku.
eng: Millions of people starve to death every year.
cmn: 每年有几百万人死于饥饿。

tok: mi toki lon tawa sina.
mi ken lukin e ona.
pilin pi jan Ton la mi lukin sama ni: mi pilin wan.
eng: Tom said he thought that I looked lonely.

tok: sina jo ala e tan tawa ni: sina lon ni.
eng: You have no reason to be here.

tok: mi jan, mi soweli pi sijelo jan.
eng: The missing link between ape and man is us.

tok: tenpo kama la mi pana e sitelen tawa sina.
jan Ton li wile sona tan jan Mawi e ni: lon seme li ike pi ijo ni.
eng: Tom asked Mary what she thought the problem was.

tok: jan Ton li tawa lon poka pi soweli tomo ona.
tenpo ala la mi mute li pana e pakala tawa jan Ton.
mi sona ala pona e jan Ton. taso mi sona pona e sina.
eng: I don't know Tom as well as I know you.

tok: mi sona ala e ni: jan Ton li lon kin.
eng: I don't know if Tom is dead or alive.

tok: tenpo suno ni la sina kalama lili mute pi nasa lili.
jan Ton li wile ala toki e ni tawa mi: ilo open mi pi tomo tawa li lon seme.
eng: Tom refused to tell me where he'd put my car keys.

tok: mi wile sona mute kin e ni: jan Ton en jan Mawi li wile e ni.
eng: I want to make absolutely sure that Tom and Mary really want to do that.

tok: nasin seme la sina ken kama weka tan tomo poki pi jan akesi?
eng: How were you able to escape from prison?

tok: jan Ton li pana e ni tawa lukin taso: ona li sona ala e toki Kanse.
eng: Tom has only been pretending that he doesn't understand French.

tok: tenpo suno Mun ale la mi mute li lon kulupu pi kalama musi uta.
eng: We have choir practice every Monday.

tok: jan Mewi li toki e ni tawa jan Ton: jan Mewi li toki pi lon ala tawa jan Ton. jan Ton o weka e ike pi jan Mewi.
eng: Mary told Tom she'd lied to him and that she was sorry.
cmn: 玛丽亚对汤姆承认，她对他撒了谎，她很抱歉。

tok: mi jo ala e wawa ni: mi toki e wile ni tawa jan lawa mi: ona li pana lili e tomo tawa sina tawa mi.
eng: I don't have the courage to ask my boss to lend me his car.

tok: mi wile e ni: tenpo ala la mi pana e olin uta tawa jan Ton!
eng: I wish that I hadn't kissed Tom.

tok: mi pali kin e musi taso.
jan Ton li toki sama sina.
eng: Tom agrees with what you say.

tok: tenpo ala la sina ken toki e ni tawa jan ante.
eng: On no account should you reveal the secret.

tok: tenpo ala la sina ken luka e nena ni.
eng: On no account must you touch that switch.

tok: sina sona ala kin e ni?
eng: Did you really not know that?

tok: ona li jo e uta pi pilin pona, la mi pilin e ni: mi kama ko.
eng: When she smiles, I feel like melting.

tok: tenpo pini la sina pana kin e mani.
mi jo ala e jan tawa ni: mi ken kepeken e toki ni.
eng: I have no one with whom to speak the language.

tok: ona li kama jo e ale la ona li jan jaki li toki suwi tawa jan lawa.
eng: He gets everything because he's a brown-noser.

tok: jan Ton li kalama pi lape sina lon supa monsi suli.
eng: Tom was snoring on the couch.

tok: mi jo ala e ilo Tenisekilo. taso mi sona e jan li jo e ona.
eng: I don't have a chain saw, but I know somebody who does.

tok: mi taso. jan ala li ken kama lon tomo tan ni: tenpo ale ni la tomo li ken kama pakala ale.
eng: Nobody else can enter the building, as it could collapse at any moment.

tok: jan Ton li tawa lukin e tomo sona pi jan ken lukin ala.
eng: Tom goes to a school for the blind.

tok: mi wile e pona ni: jan Ton li ken awen lon mi mute.
eng: I hope that Tom can wait for us.

tok: suno li tawa pi wawa lili tawa anpa.
eng: The sun is beginning to set.

tok: mi ken ala pali e ni: mi mu ala pi pilin musi tan toki musi ona.
eng: I couldn't help but laugh at his jokes.

tok: jan Ton li toki tawa jan pali pi pana telo nasa.
tenpo ale la ona li wile kama jo e sama.
eng: He always orders the same thing.

tok: jan Ton li jo e len pi mani mute taso.
jan Ton li jo e len pi mani mute taso.
mi ken ala ken lukin e meli mi tawa sina?
eng: I'd like you to meet my wife.

tok: tenpo ale la ona li toki lon ala.
sina toki lon ala la mi ken lukin e ni.
eng: I can tell when you're lying.

tok: mi olin uta ala e ona. taso ona li olin uta e mi.
eng: I didn't kiss her. She kissed me.

tok: jan Ton li weka e lipu pi ijo sin, pi sike mute.
eng: Tom threw out the old newspapers.

tok: len ale li ken weka lon poki len suli ni.
eng: Everything in this wardrobe can go.

tok: mi meli ala pi toki ma mama.
mi toki ma mama ala.
jan Ton li wile kama jo e tenpo sin tawa ni: ona li ken tawa lon ma.
eng: Tom wants to spend more time in nature.

tok: soweli pi selo jan li tawa wawa tawa sewi lon kasi suli.
eng: The monkey climbs rapidly in the tree.

tok: sina mute li wile lape lon ni la ni li ike ala.
eng: If you guys want to sleep here, it's no problem.

tok: jan Mewi li pali e moku tawa ona sama lon tomo seli.
eng: Mary is in the kitchen making herself something to eat.

tok: sina wile ala e jan Mewi lon ni, la o toki e ni tawa ona: "o tawa weka."
eng: If you don't want Mary here, ask her to leave.

tok: jan li weka akesi e poki monsi mi.
jan Ton li kama lon tomo, la soweli tomo ona li awen lon lupa tomo.
eng: Tom's cat is always waiting at the door when he arrives home.

tok: tan seme la jan Ton li pana ala e pona tawa jan Mewi?
eng: Why is Tom not helping Mary?

tok: telo sewi li anpa lon ale.
sina kama sona e toki Kanse lon tenpo suno pini anu seme?
tomo pi lipu toki li kama mani mute, taso lipu toki li kama ala tawa pi wawa mute.
eng: The post has got more expensive, but not any faster.

tok: utala li ike.
mi lukin e jan pona mi.
tenpo suli pini la mani lipu ni pi luka luka li kepeken ala.
eng: This old ten-mark bill hasn't been valid for a long time.

tok: ni li suli ala tawa mi: mi telo e lupa lukin.
eng: I don't believe it's necessary to clean the windows.

tok: jan Ton li sona e ni: ona li jo ala e mani pi mute pona.
eng: Tom knew that he didn't have enough money.

tok: mi sona e ni: jan Ton li ken ala sona e toki Kanse.
eng: I know that Tom can't understand French.

tok: tan seme la sina pilin e ni: mi tu li wile pali e ni?
eng: Why do you think that's a good idea?

tok: tenpo wan taso la mi toki tawa jan Ton.
eng: I've only spoken to Tom once.

tok: ona li kama tenpo ni: sina tawa.
eng: It's about time for you to leave.

tok: jan li ken lukin e mi tu la sina kama loje lon sinpin lawa sina anu seme?
eng: Are you embarrassed to be seen with me?

tok: jan Ton en jan Mawi li musi e musi pi sina ken lukin ala e mi.
sinpin lawa pi jan Mewi li kama loje. ni la jan Mewi li kama toki e ijo pi ijo ante.
eng: Mary blushed a little and changed the subject.

tok: jan Ton li pana e pona tawa mama meli ona lon tomo seli.
eng: Tom was in the kitchen helping his mother.

tok: jan Mewi li pana e pona tawa mama meli ona lon tomo seli.
eng: Mary was in the kitchen helping her mother.

tok: ni li nasin pona.
ona ale li kepeken ilo kule lon lawa ona.
ona ale li jo e ilo kule lon lawa ona.
mi wile e toki sin lon ilo toki.
eng: I need to make another call.

tok: jan Mawi en jan Ton li toki e ni: ona li wile kepeken noka lon tomo ona.
eng: Tom and Mary said they would be walking home.

tok: o kepeken e ilo toki!
mi wile kepeken ilo toki tawa ni taso: mi wile sona e ijo.
eng: I just thought I'd call and check.

tok: sina ken pana e ijo pi wile sina lon moku sike.
eng: You can add whatever toppings you like to the pizza.

tok: mi moku ala e ijo tan soweli. taso soweli mi li moku e ni.
eng: I don't eat anything that comes from an animal, but my cat does.

tok: kon li jaki lon ma tomo suli.
eng: The air is polluted in the big cities.

tok: tenpo ali la jan Sami li toki e lon ala tan ni: lawa ona li ike.
tenpo suno Lunto la mi kama.
sina pilin akesi e seli sewi anu seme?
sina lukin ala lukin e sike kule sewi?
sewi li jo e walo kon mute.
eng: The sky has a lot of clouds.

tok: jan Ton kin li musi.
jan Ton li pana sin e lipu tawa tomo lipu.
eng: Tom returned the book to the library.

tok: ken la jan Ton li wile e ni.
eng: Maybe Tom will agree to do that.

tok: tan seme la sina lon ala lon tomo sina?
eng: Why weren't you at home yesterday?

tok: mi awen lon tomo mi lon weka sina.
eng: I'm waiting for you at my house.

tok: mi awen lon tomo mi tawa ni: sina mute li kama.
eng: I'm waiting for you at my house.

tok: mi awen lon tomo mi lon weka sina.
eng: I'm waiting for you at my house.

tok: jan Ton li pakala ala.
o weka ala e ni: sina wile pini e ilo suno.
eng: Don't forget to turn the light off.

tok: mi weka e ni: mi wile pini e suno.
eng: I forgot to turn off the lights.

tok: sina awen ala sona e ni: o pini e suno.
eng: You forgot to turn off the lights.

tok: poki ni li ken ala kama jo e telo sin.
wile mi la sina jo e pona taso.
eng: I just want you to do your best.

tok: jan ala li wile e pilin ni: jan li kepeken ike e ona.
eng: No one likes to feel used or taken advantage of.

tok: jan Ton li pilin akesi tan lukin jan.
eng: Tom is a very shy guy.

tok: olin uta ona li kama mute en mute tawa pilin unpa.
eng: Their kisses became more and more passionate.

tok: pilin pi jan Ton li ni: jan li kepeken ike e ona.
jan Mewi li kepeken ike e jan Ton.
eng: Tom was taken advantage of by Mary.

tok: jan li kepeken jan Ton.
jan Ton li wile ala e ni: jan li kepeken ike e ona.
eng: Tom did not want to be taken advantage of.

tok: jan Ton li pana e telo walo lon telo pimeja seli ona.
eng: Tom put some milk into his coffee.

tok: jan Mewi li pana e ko pona lon sinpin lawa ona.
eng: Mary applied moisturizing cream to her face.

tok: jan Mewi li pana e ko pona lon sinpin lawa ona.
eng: Mary applied cream to her face.

tok: supa lape ni li ike.
jan Ton li jo e mani lili taso tawa e lon ona.
eng: Tom can barely make ends meet.

tok: mi toki lon la mi sona ala e ni. sina sona ala sona e ni?
eng: Truth be told, I didn't understand a thing. How about you?

tok: sitelen nimi ni li pona ala pona?
sitelen nimi ni li lon sona kule.
mama mije mi li sewi.
nasin seme la jan li kama jo e mani mute?
tenpo pini la mi telo e noka anpa mi.
ona mije li telo e linja lawa ona.
tenpo pini la jan Ton li telo e linja lawa ona.
tenpo pini la meli lili li telo e linja lawa ona.
sina telo ala telo e linja lawa sina?
tenpo suno ale la jan Ton li telo e linja lawa ona.
eng: Tom washes his hair every day.

tok: jan Ton li telo ala e linja lawa ona.
jan Mewi li telo ala e linja lawa ona.
jan Ton li telo e linja lawa sina li kepeken ala e ko pona pi linja lawa.
eng: Tom washes his hair without using shampoo.

tok: o telo e sinpin lawa sina en pona e linja lawa sina.
eng: Wash your face and comb your hair.

tok: tenpo ni la mi telo e linja lawa mi.
eng: I'm going to go wash my hair.

tok: tenpo ale la ona li telo e linja lawa ona la tenpo sinpin la ona li tawa e tomo sona.
eng: She used to wash her hair before going to school.

tok: o selo kepeken len sijelo sina.
o selo kepeken len sijelo sina.
kulupu mama mi ale li awen lon pini pi sike ma.
eng: All my relatives live at the back of beyond.

tok: mama mije li wile ala e ni: mi taso li tawa lon nena suli.
eng: Father objected to my going to the mountain alone.

tok: o pana e ilo moku lon insa pi ilo telo.
ilo telo pi poki jaki li pakala.
mi jo e ilo telo pi poki jaki.
"jan pona mute ona li tan ma seme?" "tan ma Kinla."
cmn: 「你的朋友們是哪國人啊？」「是威爾斯人。」

tok: telo pi insa poki li jaki ala jaki?
ona li pona tawa mi.
jan ala li wile kepeken musi pi jan lawa ma lon poka mi.
tomo tawa li tawa wawa lon poka li tawa sinpin mi.
eng: I was overtaken by the car.

tok: mi toki e ni: ale li pona.
eng: I said that everything was fine.

tok: mi kama pilin utala.
tenpo suno ni la mi ken ala pana e mani pi tenpo mani.
eng: I can't pay my rent today.

tok: o lukin e lipu ni: sina wile sona.
jan Ton li wile moku e telo mute.
o toki e ni tawa jan Ton: ona li ken pona e ni.
eng: Ask Tom if he can do that.

tok: pilin wawa pi jan Ton li kama weka.
jan Ton en jan Mawi li toki e ni: ona tu li pilin akesi suli.
eng: Tom and Mary said that they were really scared.

tok: tenpo ale la kasi suli ni li laso.
eng: This here is an evergreen tree.

tok: tenpo kama poka la tenpo pimeja pi jan moli li kama.
eng: Halloween is just around the corner.

tok: sina lukin sama ni: sina pilin ike.
tenpo ale la jan pi kama pona li lon tomo mi.
eng: I have people over to my place all the time.

tok: seme la linja len mi li lon?
tomo tawa pi jan Ton li selo pi kasi lili Musiko.
eng: Tom's car was covered in moss.

tok: tenpo kama la jan seme li ken pini e pali mi?
ni li toki.
kalama wawa lon ni la kalama uta pi meli ni li ken kute lili mute taso tawa jan.
eng: Her voice could hardly be heard above the noise.

tok: weka la jan li ken kute e kalama pona pi jan lili mute.
eng: Children's laughter could be heard in the distance.

tok: kule lili li kama pona tawa tomo sina.
eng: Your flat could do with some colour.

tok: kon sin li kama pona tawa sina.
eng: More fresh air would do you good.

tok: musi pi ilo luka linja li pona lili tawa mi.
jan Ton li pona lili taso tawa mi.
eng: I don't like Tom that much.

tok: soweli tomo li pona mute ala tawa mi.
eng: I don't like cats very much.

tok: jan li kepeken tomo lon ma tomo la tomo li mani pi mute ike lon tenpo mani.
eng: Rents in the city centre are prohibitively expensive.

tok: jan Ton li sike e suno lon tenpo luka luka tu wan taso.
eng: Tom is only thirteen years old.

tok: o tawa pi wawa ni ala, jan lili o! mi awen ala jan pi sike suno lili.
eng: Not so quickly, children, I'm not so young anymore!

tok: tenpo ale la jan li pana e nimi ike tawa mi tan ni: mi pali lon tenpo suli.
eng: I'm constantly getting scolded for my slow work.

tok: mi wile walo anu laso e sinpin?
eng: Should I paint the wall white or green?

tok: insa pi sike esun la tenpo pimeja la mi wile e supa moku lon tomo moku.
eng: I would like to reserve a table for Wednesday evening!

tok: mije tu ni li wile e seme tan sina?
eng: What did those two men want from you?

tok: o lukin ala e ni.
seme la linja len tu mi pi len noka li lon?
jan Ton li olin mute e jan Sopen.
eng: Tom is a big fan of Chopin.

tok: mi ken ala pali e ijo ante.
eng: I don't have any other options.

tok: tenpo wan la jan Ton li pali tawa mi.
mi sona e pakala mi. taso sina wile ala suli e ona.
eng: I know I made a mistake, but you don't need to rub it in.

tok: o tawa ala e lipu!
eng: Leave the book where it is.

tok: mi wile pana e lipu ni tawa jan Ton.
eng: I have to give Tom this book.

tok: tenpo mute la mi kama jo e lipu tan tomo lipu.
eng: I often borrow books from the library.

tok: mi lukin e lipu sina la ona li sona wile tawa mi.
eng: I've read your book. It was very interesting.

tok: sina wile e pali musi.
sina wile e pali musi.
mi wile pana e jan Ton tawa lukin pi jan lawa esun.
eng: I have to introduce Tom to the manager.

tok: sona ale pi sona mi la tenpo pini la mi toki e ale tawa sina.
eng: I've told you everything I know about Tom.

tok: jan Ton li jo e lukin sama mama ona.
jan Ton taso li pali e ni la ken la ni li pona pi mute ale anu seme?
eng: Wouldn't it be better if Tom did that by himself?

tok: o pini e musi pi ijo ni.
"sina jo e sike suno pi mute seme?" "mi jo e sike suno mute luka luka."
jan li wile awen, la ona li ken awen.
eng: Those who want to stay can stay.

tok: sina sona e ante lon pona, lon ike anu seme?
eng: Do you know the difference between right and wrong?

tok: jan li jo e moku ala la ona li moku e jan pi mani mute.
eng: When the people have nothing more to eat, they will eat the rich.

tok: jan li jo e moku ala la ona li moku e jan pi mani mute.
eng: When the people have nothing more to eat, they will eat the rich.

tok: jan Ton li jo e lukin laso.
o awen ala pilin utala!
jan ala li kama jo e ike sijelo.
mi ken ala ni.
eng: That's not something that I can do.

tok: mi lukin e sitelen pi lipu ale ni.
eng: I've read every one of those books.

tok: mi olin e soweli.
jan Ton o tawa e pan tawa mi.
sike suno pini tu la jan Ton li kama sona e tawa telo.
eng: Two years ago, Tom learned how to swim.

tok: sina jan Kanata anu seme?
mi wile e ilo open mi.
jan seme li pana e mani tawa pali?
tawa pi wan taso li pona tawa jan mute.
eng: Many people consider travelling alone to be beneficial.

tok: soweli wawa li tawa poka ante pi nasin suli.
eng: A bear was crossing the highway.

tok: jan Ton li wile ala toki tawa jan Mewi. jan Mewi li wile ala toki tawa ona.
eng: Tom won't talk to Mary and she won't talk to him.

tok: mute seme pi tenpo suno la sina kepeken tawa ni?
eng: How many days did it take you to do that?

tok: jan Ton li jan ala pi tomo sona. ona li jan sona.
eng: Tom isn't a student. He's a teacher.

tok: jan Ton en mi la mi tu li sona ala kin e toki Kanse.
eng: Both Tom and I don't understand French at all.

tok: jan Ton li toki e ni tawa jan Mewi: ona wile ala lukin e jan Mawi lon tenpo kama.
eng: Tom told Mary he didn't want to see her again.

tok: mi kute e ni: sina wile toki tawa mi.
eng: I heard you wanted to talk to me.

tok: kulupu toki Kemani li pona mute tawa mi.
mi wile ala e ni: jan Ton li lukin e ona.
eng: I don't want Tom to see it.

tok: jan li wile pana e mani pi mute ike lon esun ona.
open pi sike suno pini tu la mama meli mi li pana e kasi kule ni tawa mi lon tenpo musi pi kama lon sin pi jan Jesu.
eng: My mother gave me this flower for Easter two years ago.

tok: jan Ton li sona ala e jan lon tomo.
eng: Tom didn't know anybody in the room.

tok: mama mama mije mi li lawa sin ala e tomo tawa.
eng: My grandad doesn't drive any more.

tok: tomo poki li open.
musi pi ilo luka linja li kama lon ma Kanse lon sike suno ale nanpa luka luka tu wan.
eng: Tennis began in France in the thirteenth century.

tok: tenpo suno ni la mi awen lon tomo mi. mi lukin e lipu.
eng: I'm going to stay home today and read a book.

tok: o toki ala e nimi Ton tawa mi. o nimi ni li nimi mi ala.
eng: Stop calling me Tom. That's not my name.

tok: tenpo suno ni la jan Ton li wile pali mute.
eng: Tom has many things he has to do today.

tok: tenpo mute la mi lukin kin e lipu ale ni.
eng: I've read all of these books several times each.

tok: sina ken ala ken toki e ni tawa mi: mi ken kama lukin e jan Ton lon seme?
eng: Can you tell me where I might find Tom?

tok: pona e ni: sina toki e ni lon tenpo sinpin tawa ona.
eng: You would do well to tell it to him in advance.

tok: sina ken ala ken lukin kama jo e ni?
sina ken ala ken pana e pona tawa mi mute? mi lukin kama jo e jan Ton.
eng: Can you help us find Tom?

tok: sina pana ala pana e pona tawa jan Ton tan ni: ona li alasa e ilo open?
eng: Would you help Tom find his keys?

tok: mi wile pana e pona tawa sina la sina ken e ni: o mi lukin e ma pali tawa sina.
eng: Let me help you find a job.

tok: sina ken ala ken pana e pona tawa ni: mi lukin jo e soweli tomo mi?
eng: Could you help me find my dog?

tok: mi wile lukin e meli lili mi la sina ken ala ken pana e pona tawa mi?
eng: Can you help me find my daughter?

tok: sina wile e tomo la mi pana e pona tawa sina.
eng: I'll help you find somewhere to live.

tok: ken la jan Ton li ken pana e pona lon ni: sina lukin jo e pali.
eng: Perhaps Tom can help you find a job.

tok: sina pana ala pana e moku tawa soweli?
eng: Did you give the food to the cat?

tok: mi tawa esun suli.
mi pana e pona tawa sina lon pali ni: sina lukin kama jo e tomo.
eng: I'll help you find somewhere to live.

tok: tawa jan Ton la tomo ni li lili ike.
eng: Tom said he thought that the room was too small.

tok: jan Ton li toki e ni: ona taso ala li olin ala pali e ni.
eng: Tom said that he wasn't the only one who hated doing that.

tok: mi kama sona e nasin kulupu.
jan Ton li sona pi pona mute ala e jan Mewi.
eng: Tom didn't know Mary very well.

tok: tenpo mute la jan Ton li ken ala anu e ni: ona li wile kepeken e len seme.
eng: Tom often has trouble choosing what clothes to wear.

tok: sina lon ala lon tomo?
ni li tan ijo ala: jan li kama pilin utala.
eng: There isn't any reason to get upset.

tok: mi mute li kute e kalama musi Kelito.
mi kute ala e ni: ona li kama.
eng: I've not heard that she will come.

tok: jan Ton li toki e ken pona ni: mi tawa lon poka ona tawa ma tomo Pasen.

tok: mi sona ala kin e ni: ona li pana e ike mute tawa sina.
eng: I had no idea it would put you to so much trouble.
cmn: 我一点都不知道这会给你带来那么多问题。

tok: jan ante li kama toki tawa jan Mewi, la jan Mewi li sona ala e ni: ona o toki e seme tawa jan ante.
eng: When Mary was spoken to by a stranger, she was at a loss for words.
cmn: 当一个陌生人来和玛丽说话时，她不知道该说什么了。

tok: jan ante li kama toki tawa jan Mewi, la jan Mewi li sona ala e ni: ona o toki e seme tawa jan ante.
cmn: 当一个陌生人来和玛丽说话时，她不知道该说什么了。

tok: mi wile sona e ni: ona li tawa lon seme.
eng: I want to know where she went.

tok: mi wile e ni: jan li pona e ilo tenpo mi.
eng: I must get my watch repaired.

tok: telo nasa pan li pona.
jan Ton li lape lon tomo pali.
mi sona ala e ni: mi ken sona e ni: sina wile toki e ni tawa mi.
eng: I'm not sure that I understand what you mean.

tok: ona li suli.
ona li lon ala ni.
ona mije li olin mute e sina sama ni: mi olin e sina.
eng: He loves you as much as I do.

tok: jan Ton li wile ala e ni.
lon tenpo ala.
tenpo suno pini la jan Ton li kama jo e len sijelo lon esun.
tomo telo mije li lon noka tomo nanpa tu.
eng: The men's room is on the second floor.

tok: ona mute li pilin e ni: tenpo pini la ni li ike tawa mi mute.
eng: They thought we didn't like it.

tok: pan soweli wan li pona lili. seme li pona mute? - pan soweli tu!
eng: What's better than one Maultasche? Two Maultaschen!

tok: lon tenpo ala.
ona li kepeken e len meli poka e linja sitelen loje.
eng: She's wearing a skirt with red stripes.

tok: tenpo pimeja la suno lili li suno lon sewi.
eng: The stars shine in the night sky.

tok: telo kasi seli li pona mute tawa mi. telo wawa li pona lili.
mi pilin e ni: jan Son li olin e jan Mewi.
tenpo pimeja ni la sina kama ala kama?
sina insa ala lon supa lape la sina pali e seme?
eng: What are you doing out of bed?

tok: sina wile ala wile weka?
sina wile ala wile toki e ijo tawa mi lon tenpo pini?
eng: Did you want to talk to me about something?

tok: "sina kute e ni la sina sona e ni anu seme?" - "nimi ala."
eng: "Did you understand any of that?" "Not a word."

tok: tenpo suno musi pona tawa sina!
mi pilin e ni: sina kama lukin e ona.
mi lon ala ni, la o lawa pona e sina!
eng: You behave yourself while I'm gone.

tok: weka mi la o lawa pona e sina!
tenpo seli la ona li lete lon ni kin.
eng: It's cold there even in summer.

tok: tenpo pimeja ni la sina kama ala kama?
mi ala lon ni la sina sona e ni: sina ken toki tawa mi.
eng: You know how you can reach me when I'm out.

tok: ona li toki e ni: ona li kute ala e ijo tan sina.
eng: She said she hadn't heard from you.

tok: tenpo wan la sina ken ala ken pali e pona lon tenpo lon sina?
eng: Can you do the right thing for once in your life?

tok: mi ken pali e ijo tawa sina la o toki tawa mi.
eng: If there's anything I can do for you, let me know.

tok: mi wile e utala ala.
wile mi la ni li ike mute ala tawa sina.
eng: I hope you aren't too disappointed.

tok: ni li lon ala ni: mi mute li toki tan ni.
eng: That's not what we're talking about.

tok: soko ni li ike tawa sijelo.
mi tomo e tomo lon ma Tulu.
eng: I live in a house in Truro.

tok: ken ni li pona tawa mi: ijo li kama ante.
mi ken ala sin.
mi lukin e meli lawa ma.
mi moku ala la mi moli.
eng: If I don't eat, I will die.

tok: seme li kama? jan Lela li sona ala e ni.
eng: Layla had no idea of what was going on.

tok: jan Lela li toki tawa sewi e ni: sewi o weka e ike ona.
jan Mewi li kama loje sama seli.
jan Mewi li kute e kalama.
jan Ton li kepeken e len sama jan pali ni: ona li tawa mun.
jan ale li wile pali e ona anu seme?
eng: Does everybody need to do this?

tok: len pi ilo sona li seme?
wawa pi mute seme la mi mute li jo tawa lawa?
eng: How much power do we have available?

tok: ona mute li pimeja walo.
ona li sona ala e mi.
ona li jo e soweli tomo.
ona li wile open kin.
ona li kepeken toki Inli e toki Kanse kin.
eng: He speaks English, and French as well.

tok: ona li ken toki kepeken toki Tosi.
tenpo ale la ona li moku e kon seli pi kasi wawa.
ijo ala li monsuta tawa ona.
ona li pilin e ni: toki ni li musi.
eng: He regarded the story as a joke.

tok: ona li meli tan ma Pokasi.
tenpo kama poka la jan Ton en jan Mewi li tawa tomo.
eng: Tom and Mary will be going home soon.

tok: tan seme la sina kama sona e toki Kanse?
eng: What do you study French for?

tok: mi pana e ijo mi lon poki.
eng: I have already packed my things.

tok: jan Ton li pana e telo uta.
mi pana e poki tawa mi lon seme?
eng: Where do I put my bags?

tok: suno li kama anpa.
ko lete suwi li pona tawa jan Ton.
jan ale pi kulupu mama mi li jo e mani mute.
eng: Everyone in my family is rich.

tok: jan Ton li pali e ale tan ni: pakala li ken ala kama tawa jan Mawi.
eng: Tom would do anything to protect Mary.

tok: tomo tawa pi telo anpa li sewi lon telo.
jan Mewi li pakala e luka pi ona sama kepeken palisa lipu.
eng: Mary sliced her hand open with a kitchen knife.

tok: nena kute wan ona li kute ala.
eng: He is deaf in one ear.

tok: ona li toki suli. taso toki suli ona ni li jaki.
pona. sina ken ala ken toki sin e ni?
jan ale li wile tawa ma pi mama sewi. taso jan ala li wile e ni: moli li kama.
eng: Everyone wants to go to heaven, but no one wants to die.

tok: mi wile ala pali e ni lon tenpo sin.
sina tawa ala tawa poka pi telo suli?
eng: Did you go to the beach?

tok: mi lukin ala e ijo sin.
jan pona sina ni li lawa e ni: sina kama lon kulupu ike.
eng: These "friends" are a bad influence on you.

tok: len noka pi jan Ton li lon anpa pi supa lape ona.
eng: Tom's shoes are under his bed.

tok: mi kute e kalama ni: telo lili li kama anpa.
sina lukin jo e ijo. sina kama jo e ona anu seme?
eng: Have you found what you were looking for?

tok: ma pi tomo tawa telo li lon poka pi tomo tawa linja.
eng: The docks are connected to the rail network.

tok: ko lete walo li pona tawa mi kin. taso mute li pona lili taso.
eng: I like snow as well, just not so much of it.

tok: tenpo mute la jan pi toki Epelanto li toki tawa jan pi toki Epelanto e ni: sina jan sama mi.
cmn: 世界語者經常以「同志」稱呼對方。

tok: jan Ton li jan pi pona mute.
eng: Tom is a very good person.

tok: jan ale li kepeken e toki sama.
eng: And the whole earth was of one language, and of one speech.

tok: ona li kama tan open pi nasin suno, la ona li kama lukin e insa pi nena mute lon ma Sina li kama awen lon ni.
eng: And it came to pass, as they journeyed from the east, that they found a plain in the land of Sinnar; and they dwelt there.

tok: ona tu ale li jo e sinpin lawa pi pilin pona.
ona li pali e pona.
jan Ton li wile kama jo e ijo lon esun. mi sona e ona.
eng: I know what Tom wants to buy.

tok: tenpo ale la tomo seli li jaki.
sina tawa ala tawa poka pi telo suli?
eng: Did you go to the beach?

tok: sina awen lon seme lon ma tomo?
eng: Which part of the city do you live in?

tok: jan esun li lukin taso e ni: mani li wile kama pi mute en mute.
eng: Merchants only look at the profits.

tok: o awen lon supa lape!
jan li ken ala ken pana e pona tawa mi?
tenpo esun kama la mi lukin e jan pi pana sona mi.
eng: Next week I will see my teacher.

tok: mi wile ala seli e ona.
eng: I don't have to cook it.

tok: ona li kama sin, la o toki e wile sona tawa ona.
eng: Ask her when she gets back.
cmn: 等她回来的时候问问她。

tok: nasin seme la lon pi mi mute li kama lon?
ni li ike tawa mi. o pana e ijo ante tawa lukin mi.
eng: I don't like this. Show me another.
cmn: 我不喜歡這個。給我看看其他的。

tok: ona li meli li jo e lawa pi wawa mute.
eng: She is a woman of superior intelligence.

tok: sina kama lon ni la o toki e ni tawa mi.
eng: Drop me a line as soon as you get there.
cmn: 到了那兒之後跟我說一聲兒。

tok: mi kepeken lipu pi nimi ale, la ni li ike tawa sina anu seme?
eng: Would you mind my using this dictionary?

tok: tan seme la sina kama jan pali pi nasin pali?
eng: Why did you become a police officer?

tok: sina moku ala moku lon poka mi lon open pi tenpo pimeja?
eng: Won't you join us for dinner?
cmn: 你不來跟我們一起吃晚飯嗎？

tok: kon li ike lon ni. sina ken ala ken open e lupa suno?
eng: The air is bad here. Will you open the window?
cmn: 這裡的空氣不是很好。你可以打開窗戶嗎？

tok: mi ken ala kepeken sijelo mi tawa pali.
eng: I'm unable to do manual labour.

tok: jan ala li ken toki e ni: ijo lon ni li lon ala.
eng: No one can deny the fact.

tok: ona li kama jan pi tomo poki tan ni: ona li weka akesi e ijo.
eng: He was in prison on a charge of robbery.

tok: jan utala li toki suli e ni tawa jan lawa: tenpo ale la ona li pana e pona tawa jan lawa.
eng: The knight swore an oath of allegiance to the king.

tok: kama pi tenpo suli nanpa tu tu la mi pali.
mi toki lon toki Kanse la ni li pona tawa mi. mi toki lon toki Inli la ni li kiwen tawa mi.
eng: I find it much easier to speak French than English.
cmn: 對我來說法語比英語說起來簡單得多。

tok: jan Mali li toki e ni: ona li pilin ike.
eng: Mary said that she was depressed.

tok: mi pilin e ni: sina jo e len ni, la sina pona lukin.
eng: I think that jersey suits you.
cmn: 我觉得这件运动衫很适合你。

tok: tenpo pini la mi lon ma Inli la tenpo mute la mi lukin e lipu.
cmn: 在英国的时候，我经常看参考书。

tok: o pana e supa monsi lon poka. ona li lon nasin mi.
eng: Please move the chair. It's in the way.

tok: mi moku ala e soweli.
ken la jan Ton en jan Mali li ala lon tomo ona.
eng: It looks like Tom and Mary aren't at home.

tok: telo sewi li pini la mi mute li tawa ma.
eng: We're not going outside until it stops raining.
cmn: 除非雨停了，我们才会出去。

tok: open pi tenpo suno ale la mi tawa noka poka soweli tomo mi lon ma kasi pi ma tomo.
eng: I walk my dog in the park every morning.
cmn: 我每天早上到公园里遛狗。

tok: lon li pona ale la ijo ante li pona lili taso.

tok: ona li sona e ale pi toki lon ala.
tenpo pimeja la mi kin kama. ni li pona tawa mi.
eng: I am happy to come with you this evening.

tok: telo suli ale li kama lete.
tenpo ni la sina lape ala anu seme?
ali o kama pakala.
o kama wile e ike pi lili mute!
ilo open mi li kama weka. nasin seme la mi mute li ken open e lupa tomo kepeken wawa?
eng: I lost my keys. How can we force the door open?

tok: sina sona pi pona mute e ni: mi wile toki e seme.
eng: You know quite well what I mean.

tok: tenpo pini la mi ken ala e ni: jan Ton li tawa weka.
jan Ton o, mi wile toki tawa sina.
eng: Tom, I must talk to you.

tok: ona li lon la mi toki tawa sina mute.
eng: I'll let you know when it's ready.

tok: jan Mewi li toki e ni tawa jan Ton: o kipisi e kili.
eng: Mary asked Tom to chop the onions.

tok: sina jo ala jo e ken seme?
jan Ton li tawa wawa kepeken noka anu seme?
sina jan lili.
sina jan lili.
sina jan lili.
sina jan lili.
ona li pali wawa.
ona li lukin sama ni: ona li esun ike.
lipu toki ni li tawa sina.
tenpo ni la mi moku e pan.
o awen lon ni. o tawa ala e sina sama.
olin li wile jo.
kepeken ilo pi pana sitelen la mi ken ala ken kama jo e sitelen pi ma ni?
mi jo e jan pona ala tawa ni: ona li ken pana e pona tawa mi.
mi pilin lape mute tan pali mi.
mije li wile pali.
mi jan ala pi nasin Pasimo.
pona a!
jan Ton li pali e ni lon tenpo wan.
ona li kepeken supa anpa.
eng: He was sitting on the floor.

tok: sina ken kepeken tenpo pi suli pona.
mi anu la mi wile pali wawa e ni.
suwi pan tu li lon ni.
ona li lili e linja lawa ona kepeken ilo tu.
sina jo ala kin e ijo pi suli sina!
sina wile sona e toki ante anu seme?
eng: Are you interested in foreign languages?

tok: pali mi li lape e mi.
eng: I am tired of my work.

tok: jan li lawa e lipu ni tawa ma pi pona ala.
eng: This letter has been sent to the wrong place.

tok: mi pilin e ni: ona li toki suli la ona li pali.
eng: I think he'll keep his promise.

tok: toki pi ijo sin li pakala e pilin ona.
mi kute e toki pi ijo sin ni, la ni li ijo sin nasa tawa mi.
eng: When I heard the news, I was very surprised.
cmn: 我听到这个消息很吃惊。

tok: ona li wile ala kama jo e ilo pi sitelen suno lon esun.
eng: He doesn't plan to buy a camera.
cmn: 他不打算买一个摄像机。

tok: sina wile la o moku e suwi pan ale.
eng: Have as many biscuits as you like.
cmn: 想吃多少饼干就吃多少。

tok: ona li pilin wawa e ni: mi pali e ike lon tenpo pini.
cmn: 她坚持认为那是我的错。

tok: ona li pilin wawa e ni: mi pali e ike lon tenpo pini.
cmn: 她坚持认为那是我的错。

tok: len sin li pona mute tawa ona.
eng: She was very pleased with the new dress.
cmn: 那条新裙子让她很满意。

tok: ona li jan pi sike lili. taso ni li suli mute: ona li pona lukin.
cmn: 他很年轻，更重要的是，他很帅。

tok: wile mi la tenpo lili la lipu sina li kama tawa mi.
eng: I hope to receive a letter from you soon.
cmn: 我期待很快就能收到你的信。

tok: sina wile jo e tenpo lon suli la o kepeken ala kon nasa.
cmn: 如果你想活得久一点就戒烟。

tok: sina sona e ni anu seme: jan li tawa tomo lawa pi ma tomo tan tomo pi tomo tawa linja lon tenpo pi suli seme?
eng: Do you know how far it is from the station to city hall?
cmn: 你知道从火车站到市政府有多远？

tok: ken la sina ken pilin e ni: seme li kama lon tenpo kama.
cmn: 但你很可能猜得到会发生什么。

tok: jan li wile pali e suwi pan la jan li wile kepeken e sike waso e ko jelo, e suwi.
cmn: 要做蛋糕，你要用到鸡蛋，黄油和糖。

tok: tan seme la sina toki e wile ni tawa jan: ona o weka e ike pi sina ala?
eng: Why do you want to apologise for something you didn't do?
cmn: 为什么你要对你没做过的事表示抱歉？

tok: tenpo ni la sina sona ala kin e ni. taso nimi sina li kama lon lipu lon tenpo lili.
cmn: 即使你还不知道，你的名字就将见报了。

tok: ilo sona li kalama.
o kepeken tenpo mute.
tomo pi mama mije sama mi li lon ma tomo Paki. ona li kama lon tomo pi mi mute.
eng: My uncle, who lives in Paris, came to see us.

tok: o weka ala e poki lon anpa.
mi wile e pona la sina jan pona mi.
lukin laso sina li pona lukin.
o weka tan tomo seli.
taso ona li pona ala kin.
jan li kama sona wawa la jan li kama lon pona pi mute en mute.
mama mije pi meli mi li jan sewi pi sitelen musi.
eng: I have a friend whose father is a famous writer.
cmn: 我有個朋友的父親是知名的作家。

tok: open pi sike suno mute pini la jan Ton li weka tan lukin.
sina kepeken ilo pi sitelen suno tawa seme?
toki Inli li ilo toki.
o moku ala e telo ni.
pilin pi jan Ton en mi li sama ala.
eng: Tom and I didn't agree with each other.

tok: telo li pona mute tawa soweli suli pi telo tawa.
mije ni li pali lon tomo sitelen ona.
eng: The man works in his office.
cmn: 男人在自己的办公室里工作。

tok: mi lon tomo telo.
moku li pona lili taso.
mi ken ala ken toki tawa sina?
toki! sina lon ala lon ni sin?
tenpo suli nanpa luka luka wan la o kama tawa mi.
mi sona e ni: tawa musi li pona tawa sina.
eng: I know that you like sports.
cmn: 我知道你喜欢体育运动。

tok: jan Ton li toki ala sin e ni tawa mi: mi wile kama jo e seme lon esun.
eng: Tom hasn't told us what to buy yet.
cmn: 汤姆还没对我们说他希望我们买什么呢。

tok: ale li jaki.
o kepeken len. o kama poka mi.
eng: Put on clothes and come with us!
cmn: 穿上衣服，然后跟我们来！

tok: o kepeken len. o kama poka mi.
eng: Put on clothes and come with us!
cmn: 穿上衣服，然后跟我们来！

tok: o kepeken len. o kama poka mi.
eng: Put on clothes and come with us!
cmn: 穿上衣服，然后跟我们来！

tok: monsi mi li pakala la mi ken ala musi e musi Teni.
eng: I can't play tennis because my back hurts.

tok: sina pini ala pini e pali?
mi kama tan suwi tawa pakala!
mi pilin lape kin.
tenpo li lili ike ni anu seme: jan li moku ala e telo nasa loje?
eng: Is it too early for red wine?

tok: o kama ala lon poka pi meli mi lon tenpo sin!
eng: Don't you ever go near my girl again.
cmn: 别再接近我的女朋友了！

tok: jan Ton li anu e ni: ona li awen poka jan Mali.
eng: Tom decided to stay with Mary.
cmn: 汤姆决定陪玛丽在一起。

tok: mi pali e ni: mi toki suli e seme.
eng: I did what I promised to do for them.
cmn: 我做到了我承诺要为他们做的事情。

tok: pini la ona li kama tan nasa tawa sona.
ona li pilin e ni: mani mute en pona nasa li sama.
cmn: 他认为财富和幸福是等同的。

tok: tenpo kama la sina pana ala e pona.
sina ken ala pana e pona.
sina pilin ala pilin wawa e ni?
sina pilin wawa e ni anu seme?
o awen sona e ni: sina wile sitelen e nimi sina lon lipu nanpa.
eng: Don't forget to fill in your name on the form.
cmn: 别忘了在名单上写上你自己的名字。

tok: o awen sona e ni: sina wile sitelen e nimi sina lon lipu nanpa.
eng: Don't forget to fill in your name on the form.

tok: o awen sona e ni: sina wile sitelen e nimi sina lon lipu nanpa.
eng: Don't forget to fill in your name on the form.
cmn: 别忘了在名单上写上你自己的名字。

tok: sina selo e ona sama lon monsi pi kasi suli.
ni li lukin sama ni: mi en sina lon tomo tawa telo sama.
eng: It seems we are in the same boat.
cmn: 看起来我们是在一条船上。

tok: sina jo ala jo e ilo tu?
tomo tawa linja li tawa tomo pi tomo tawa linja.
eng: The train headed towards the railway station.

tok: mi ken ala lukin e ona.
mi tawa tomo sona ala tan ni: mi ike sijelo.
eng: Since I was sick, I didn't go to school.
cmn: 由于我生病了，我便没去上学。

tok: mi sona ala e tan. taso ona li lukin sama pilin anpa.
eng: She looks blue for some reason.
cmn: 由于某些原因，她看起来很忧伤。

tok: jan Ton li wile ala pali lon ma tomo Pasen.
cmn: 汤姆不想在波士顿工作。

tok: linja lawa pi jan Lisi li sike ala li jelo.
moku telo li kiwen.
sina wile e ni: jan ala li sona e ni: sina jan seme.
o awen sona e mi mute.
sina pakala e lawa.
kili li loje la ona li moku ala e ona.
mi sona ala e ni: sina pilin sama ni: mi pilin.
eng: I don't know if you feel the same as I do.
cmn: 我不知道你是否和我有一样的感觉。

tok: mi lon ijo ante.
tenpo suli kin la mi alasa e pali.
cmn: 我已经找了很久的工作。

tok: jan Ton li tawa wawa kepeken wawa ona ale tan ni: tawa lukin la jan Mewi li toki e ijo sin pona.
cmn: 汤姆以最快的速度跑着，好向玛丽宣布好消息。

tok: mi pilin e ni: ni li suli ala.
eng: I don't think that it's necessary.

tok: mi sona e ijo!
mi kepeken toki Epanja la ni li pona tawa mi.
mi kepeken ala supa lape.
eng: I don't sleep in a bed.

tok: nasin seme la mani pi pali sina li kama tawa ona?
eng: What does that gentleman do for a living?

tok: mi jan ni: ona li ike sijelo.
sina wile ala wile e pan?
o moli ala e jan!
mije Pun li jan pona tan ma Olekon. tenpo suno kama ni ona li kama tawa tomo mi.
cmn: 一个从俄勒冈州来的朋友，布朗先生明天会来拜访我们。

tok: sina pana ala e pona sina tawa mi la mi ken ala pini e pali ni.
eng: Without your help, I wouldn't have been able to finish the work.
cmn: 如果不是因为有你的帮助，我不可能完成了这个工作。

tok: sina kepeken ala nasin selo la sina ken kama lon pakala.
cmn: 如果你不按照安全手续来的话，你可能会受伤的。

tok: poki ona li lon ni la ona li ken ala lon kin lon tomo sona.
eng: His bag is still here, so he can't have gone to school yet.
cmn: 他的包就在这儿，所以他不可能已经去了学校。
